tool_description: Retrieves benchmark performance data and metadata for portfolio comparison analysis including market indices and custom benchmarks.

benchmark_symbol.description: Ticker symbol or identifier for the benchmark (e.g., SPY, VTI, custom_benchmark_001)

start_date.description: Start date for benchmark data (ISO 8601 format)

end_date.description: End date for benchmark data (ISO 8601 format)

include_dividends.description: Whether to include dividend returns in total return calculation

error_messages: Benchmark not found: The specified benchmark_symbol is not available. Check symbol format and availability.
Invalid date range: start_date must be before end_date, both in ISO 8601 format.
Data unavailable: Benchmark data not available for the requested time period. Try a different date range.
Symbol format error: Ensure benchmark_symbol follows correct naming conventions.
usage: Specify a benchmark symbol and date range to retrieve performance data. The tool returns time series data and benchmark metadata for comparison analysis.

timestamps.description: Array of timestamps for benchmark data points

prices.description: Array of benchmark prices corresponding to timestamps

total_return.description: Total return of benchmark over the period

dividend_yield.description: Average dividend yield over the period
